ssot__EngagementAnalysisTextSession__dlm.name: Engagement Analysis Text Session
ssot__EngagementAnalysisTextSession__dlm.description: The Engagement Analysis Text Session DMO represents an engagement session during a particular time period with multiple forms. For example, a chat session, a survey response, and a case can all occur during one customer's session.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is the name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__Id__c.description: The identifier of the engagement analysis text session.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the data record.

ssot__EngagementAnalysisTextEndDateTime_.description: The date and time when an engagement session ends.

ssot__EngagementAnalysisTextStartDateTim.description: The date and time when an engagement session starts.
